Blog.post: hi!! im back again..hahax...lame sia...todae we do the apple crumble and shepherd's pie..haiz..i dun hav shepherd's pie cos sandra not here again so dun hav lorx... so i got two apple crumble which is taste better than the shepherd's pie..hai yo the sheramin go throw away the apple crumble lorx.. actually oso wanna throw away the shepherd's pie oso one lorx.. but i took it frm her hahax...today so cold ..its raining...i didnt brin jacket...so cold...now got flu..*ah choo! haiz.. not onli flu oso hav cough ..*cough..then still got stomachache... then i realise every time got stomachache iz alwaes on monday one lorx.. strange huh?? tomolo still got history CA...OMG!! haven study yet....dunno how to study ..should i rite down the note?? so i can remember better..haiz..actually got junior orchestra until 5.45 one lorx.. but i got stomachache so i go tell secionla leader that i cannot "tahan' ani more let me go 1st...no choice...very pain...actually no one wan to go today one lorx.. onli the fronda wan to go.. so crazy over the co..@ 1st she oso sae dun wanna go one lorx.. in the end oso go coz she dun wanna to lose ani co lesson...but tomolo then got cher come mahz... today go onli let the stupid idiotic guy xiang le scold ...then today some more sec 3 got lesson them every one to the fourth floor to pratise lorx.. then when i went up then i noe is lyk every one play together lorx.. it was lyk playing at the beautiful scene..i dun tink got ani boys lorx.. except for one.. tt's wen da..he oso never miss ani co lesson b4 ... dunno is he lyk co so much lyk fronda or he dun dare to miss ani of the lesson if not will kana or wad eva larz... haiz.. then the chinese paper havan get back oso lorx... the ma lao shi sae wanna wait for sandra to come back first wait for her to do finish the paper 1st then go through the paper together...haiz..

haiz..sianz...juz finish doing all the shitty home work.. oh yah.... still got common ca on tues on history ... haiz..haven go study yet..dun need study liao lorx.. sure die one... wa lao.. the stupid co got so many practise lorx...tomolo still hav...other sch onli got 2 days lorx.. lyk coral sec ...pasir ris sec...y our sch got so many practise...then make us so busy ... no time to study....still dunno how much i get for the chinese test lorx... so scared...sure very lousy one..i 1st question dunno how to do liao lorx..haiz...oso dunno if ma lao shi finish markin liao not..haiz....yesterday i chat wif one gal frm coral sec lorx.. she iz my ex-classmate's frien...siao liao lorx..i dun really noe her i can chat wif her for dunno how long larz..ani wae very long..its so amazin..her name iz rosalia (i tink so..) sounds lyk malay rite but she is a chinese lorx.. then she oso in co play erhu lorx.. same as me sia!! OMG!!she still got one more frien oso add me ...name gretel...all the names guai guai one lorx... i juz wanna meet her face to face...dunno y can chat wif her so long lorx.. lyk got a lot of things can sae lyk tt ..i didnt see her b4 lorx.. yesterday then i really got to noe her chat wif her..at first i thought she was i tamil gal lorx.. coz my ex-classmate iz a tamil guy.. dunno y dun hang around with tamil or malay guys lorx..but chinese...futher more is gals lorx.. not guys!! same as nicholas n chee yang lyk tt ... wa liew!!some more rosalia oso sae he dun go to his tamil class lorx ... he jux stay in their chinese lesson.!!some thing is rong in his mind i tink ...
